column2: You control an expanded hospital, you can order that they grow a new pair of eyes for you using your genetic code.  They should be ready in about three months.
Your new eyes are ready and can be implanted now.
You control an expanded hospital, you can order a new limb be grown for you using your genetic code.  It will be about a year before the limb is ready.
Your new limb is fully grown and has been fused to your nerves.
